About


About Me

Science communicator, entrepreneur, and bioengineer. Currently Montréal based biohacker at Bricobio, marketing manager at The Brane and freelancer. While completing a Masters degree in Bioscience Engineering at KULeuven, I’ve done research on Mycorrhizal fungi genetics at University of Montréal. Ow, I also travel all the time.
